alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 01 at 3:05PM CDT until April 01 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Critical fire weather conditions expected across portions of the area this afternoon... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 027 AND 041... * Affected Area...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 027 Wallace and Fire Weather Zone 041 Greeley. * Timing...This afternoon, mainly between 12 PM and 7 PM MDT. * Winds...South 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 14 percent. * Temperatures...In the upper 60s. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: Avoid outdoor burning. Repeating, outdoor burning is not advised today. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.
